title: [Placements]When is the placement cell in rr open? Is it open on Sundays? I have to go to rr tomorrow for some query so I need a quick reply please. It would also be helpful if you guys could tell me the timings
content: Please do mention who to contact for a query too.  Really confused with the hierarchy. Is it venkatesh or sridhar that's at the top or is it somasheaker

comments.body: I think it is closed on Sundays; Your primary point of contact would be Somashekar, if the issue doesn't get resolved there then go to venkatesh
